```{python}
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("data/lightcast_job_postings_cleaned.csv")
df.head()
print("Columns in df:", list(df.columns))
```


```{python}
# 2) Top 10 “industries” by NAICS_2022_6_NAME
col_ind = "NAICS_2022_6_NAME"
cnt_ind = df[col_ind].value_counts().head(10)
plt.figure(figsize=(8,5))
plt.barh(cnt_ind.index, cnt_ind.values)
plt.gca().invert_yaxis()
plt.title("Top 10 NAICS_2022_6 Industries by Job Postings")
plt.xlabel("Number of Postings")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```

```{python}
# 3) Job postings by state
cnt_st = df["STATE_NAME"].value_counts().head(10)
plt.figure(figsize=(8,5))
plt.bar(cnt_st.index, cnt_st.values)
plt.xticks(rotation=45, ha="right")
plt.title("Top 10 States by Job Postings")
plt.ylabel("Number of Postings")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```

```{python}
# 4) Remote vs On-Site
cnt_r = df["REMOTE_TYPE_NAME"].value_counts()
plt.figure(figsize=(5,5))
plt.pie(cnt_r.values, labels=cnt_r.index, autopct="%1.1f%%")
plt.title("Remote vs On-Site Jobs")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

```
